name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry Laboratory
text_and_materials: Chemistry 3328 Introductory Organic Chemistry Laboratory Manual (Spring 2019 Edition)
optional_texts: Williamson, K.L., Microscale and Macroscale Organic Experiments, 2nd ed. (D.C. Heath, 1994)
Zubrick, J. W., The Organic Chem Lab Survival Manual, 9th ed. (Wiley,2014)

name: Modern Techniques Of Organic Chemistry Laboratory
text_and_materials: CHEM BC 3333x Modern Techniques Of Organic Chemistry Laboratory Manual (Fall 2020 Electronic Edition)
Computer programs: ChemDraw (free version available via Columbia using your UNI), MestReNova
optional_texts: Most, C. F. Experimental Organic Chemistry, John Wiley & Sons, New York, 1988.
Williamson, K. L. Macroscale and Microscale Organic Experiments, D.C. Heath and Company, Lexington, MA, 1989.
Kemp, W. Organic Spectroscopy, 3rd ed., W. H. Freeman, New York, 1991.
Zubrick, J. W. The Organic Chemistry Lab Survival Manual, 6th ed., John Wiley & Sons, New York, 2003.
Pavia, D. L.; Lampman, G. M.; Kriz, G. S., Jr. Introduction to Organic Laboratory Techniques, 3rd ed., Saunders College Publishing, New York, 1988.
Silverstein, R. M.; Webster, F. X. Spectrometric Identification of Organic Compounds, 6th ed., John Wiley & Sons, New York, 1998.
Shriner, R. L.; Hermann, C. K. F.; Morrill, T. C.; Curtin, D. Y.; Fuson, R. C. The Systematic Identification of Organic Compounds, 7th ed., John Wiley & Sons, New York, 1998.
